transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Namaskar.
Customer: Haan. Hello. Ji main India Mart se baat kar raha hun sir. India Mart se baat kar raha hun sir.
Executive: Haan. Hello. Aksham e-commerce private Aksham e-commerce private limited se baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir aapki service ke regarding maine connect kiya tha. To abhi kaise chal rahi hai sir India Mart ki service sir aapki?
Customer: Achchi hai badhiya chal rahi hai. Kal hi se activate hui hai wo.
Executive: Haan kal hi activate hui hai to aapne yahan pe concern kuch raise hua tha sir service ke regarding. To abhi as such koi issue to nahi aa raha sir service mein? Abhi leads vagarah aapne kuch consume ki hogi to usme as such kuch dikkat ho to bataiye mere ko sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Okay sir agar as such koi aapko dikkat rehta hai to aap mere ko jarur bataiyega sir aur aap mera ye number aap save kar sakte hain sir theek hai?
Customer: Theek theek hai.
Executive: Haan haan aur sir isme aap jo deal karte hain wo isme hi karte hain na sir red flex leather resolving gaming chair ho gaya yellow flex ho gaya.
Customer: Haan haan ye furniture items hai.
Executive: Achcha aur sir mere ko itna ye janna tha ki aapke pass kai sari lead is tarah ki show ho rahi hai aapki profile jaise makhana ho gaya. Theek hai purnia bihar se makhana ki lead aa rahi hai. Theek hai to aap makhana mein bhi deal karte hain kya sir?
Customer: Haan main makhana mein bhi kar raha hun.
Executive: Okay okay to sir isme makhana bhi category mein add kar do sir?
Customer: Haan cut kar do aap.
Executive: Theek hai to iska price kya rehta hai sir aapka?
Customer: Ah price dal do 1000 rupees per kg.
Executive: Makhana 1000.
Customer: Theek hai sir aur iska image kahan se dalna hai sir?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Iska image makhana ka photo photo bhi dalna hoga na iska?
Customer: Haan photo aap google se leke dal do matlab loose makhane ke theek hai.
Executive: Haan main google se leke dal deta hun. Aur isme fasai ka aapka wo hai aapke pass hai?
Customer: Mere fasai ka nahi hai wo main apply karwa raha hun to kuch din mein mil jayega mujhe.
Executive: Achcha chalo sir ji sir baki koi aur issue bhi aap koi concern ho aapka to mere ko bataiye sir India Mart se.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai aur aapka charges sir kya rehta hai sir?
Customer: Ah main pure India mein deal kar raha hun.
Executive: All over India deal karte hain. Haan haan theek hai haan to isme sir main all over India to abhi aapne jo lead consume kiye sir customer ke sath sir aapka conversation hua hoga sir?
Customer: Baat chal rahi hai conversion abhi nahi hui hai.
Executive: Baat chal rahi hai conversion abhi nahi hui hai.
Executive: Koi nahi conversion sir aapka ho jayega theek hai to abhi aapko lead jo consume kar rahe hain usme sir aapko kis tarah ke lead lag rahi hai kuch conversion aisa lag raha hai ki abhi discussion mode pe hai kuch negotiation vagarah manga hoga sir aapse to abhi lag raha hai ki ho jayega.
Customer: Haan wo negotiation chal raha hai.
Executive: Haan achcha achcha chalo badhiya hai baki sir agar koi concern rehta hai sir India Mart ke end se to aap mere ko jarur bataiyega sir.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai haan haan aur sir mere ko mera sir mera naam Mohit hai sir aapka account manager hun theek hai haan aap mera number save kar lijiyega theek hai aur aapko koi bhi further concern rehta hai theek hai ya fir koi shikayat rehti service mein to aap mere ko sir kabhi bhi connect kar sakte hain sir.
Customer: Theek theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai aapko lead se related ya India Mart ki kisi bhi service se related ya jo aapki service abhi continue chal rahi hai usse related koi bhi concern rahega aap mere ko connect kar sakte hain sir. Theek hai aur sir specifically ye ki sir aapke pass na mera wo jayega mail pe ek feedback form jayega theek hai to please satisfy mark kar dijiyega sir usme theek hai aur haan main aapka ye jo concern tha to main isse close kar deta hun sir theek hai. Satisfy wala theek hai to main aapke pass feedback form jayega na to usme please satisfy yes mark kar dijiyega sir theek hai.
Customer: Haan main kar dunga theek theek hai.
Executive: Haan aap mera number save kar lijiyega aap kabhi bhi mere connect karenge to main available hun aapke liye.
Customer: Theek hai okay okay okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer inquired about adding makhana category.

- Customer needs guidance on image upload.



Resolution:

- Executive added makhana category to profile.

- Executive advised using Google for makhana images.

- Executive offered ongoing support and contact information.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark satisfaction in feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- makhana, category, image, feedback
